title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 371.6 - Public lodging house or shelter care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 371.6 - Public lodging house or shelter care

State Regulations

The local plan of administration shall specify the
policies and procedures governing the provision of lodging house or shelter
care. All requirements for the approval of such plans shall be
applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
371.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
